activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13248
activity.text:
Hi, after reviewing the render loop, the delete button currently appears even when only one sub-question remains. Add a simple count check so the delete option only shows only if there are multiple sub-questions. This guarantees at least one sub-question always stays and prevents accidental removal.
ETA: PR will be opened within 24 hrs

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12884
activity.text:
Hi,
I'd like to work on this issue. My proposal is to run a validation check on required fields (like name and slug) when the preview button is pressed. If the fields are invalid, the preview should not open and the cursor should focus on the first invalid field. Once the required fields are valid, the preview should function as expected.

Expected Timeline:
End date: July 18, 2025

Additional Context:
I'm currently working on a similar valueset preview issue #12741 , so I already have context on the related code.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12693
activity.text:
> **Describe the bug**
> 
> A validation error is thrown when trying to administer a medicine at the same time it is added.
> 
> **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior:
> 
> 1. Go to live encounter
> 2. Medicine
> 3. Add a medicine and administor it on the same time
> 4. See error
> 
> **Expected behavior**
> 
> The medicine should be successfully administered if the administration time matches the time it was added, without triggering a validation error.
> 
> **Screenshots**
> 
> ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fbb83437-0b80-4be5-9d72-2d51ef121dce)
>
